title: Application Support - Adobe Creative Cloud Activation
description: A user reports their Adobe Creative Cloud applications are showing as a trial, even though the company has a license.

tasks.description: Check the Adobe Admin Console to ensure the user has been assigned an Adobe CC license.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician confirms a license is assigned to the user's email address.

tasks.description: Determine the user is logged into the Creative Cloud app with their personal Adobe ID instead of their corporate one.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician correctly identifies the root cause of the issue.

tasks.description: Instruct the user to sign out of the Creative Cloud desktop app and sign back in using the 'Sign in with Company or School Account' option.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user successfully activates their license.
